version.description:
Neo4j kernel is a lightweight, embedded Java database designed to
        store data structured as graphs rather than tables. For more
        information, see http://neo4j.org.

check.name: Maintained

documentation.short: Determines if the project is "actively maintained".

check.reason: 30 commit(s) out of 30 and 6 issue activity out of 30 found in the last 90 days -- score normalized to 10

check.name: Code-Review

documentation.short: Determines if the project requires code review before pull requests (aka merge requests) are merged.

check.reason: 0 out of last 30 changesets reviewed before merge -- score normalized to 0

documentation.short: Determines if the project has an OpenSSF (formerly CII) Best Practices Badge.
Determines if the project has open, known unfixed vulnerabilities.

check.name: Signed-Releases

documentation.short: Determines if the project cryptographically signs release artifacts.

details: Warn: no GitHub releases found
